alert.note: Alert for Grant; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 12:44PM CDT until March 30 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Grant Parish in north central Louisiana... Central Winn Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 1243 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles south of Jonesboro to near Winnfield to 20 miles north of Colfax to 9 miles northeast of Montgomery, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Winnfield, Atlanta, Joyce and Hudson. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Louisiana.
